name: auto-post.io
author: Hurter Design Studio

sections.description:
This plugin allows you to import/update/delete posts from auto-post.io

Privacy notices

With the default configuration, this plugin, in itself, does not:

  • track users by stealth;
  • write any user personal data to the database;
  • send any data to external servers;
  • use cookies.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire hds_auto_post folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins screen (Plugins > Installed Plugins).

You will find auto-post.io menu in your WordPress admin screen.

For basic usage, have a look at auto-post.io.
sections.faq:
Do you have questions or issues with auto-post.io WordPress plugin ?

Contact our Support
sections.changelog:
1.0.0 – 2024-09-10

  • Generate auto-post.io token
  • Create/Update/Delete blog posts from auto-post.io (with thumbnail upload)
